name: react-bash-helpers
description: Some scripts to generate comon react module structure with stndard files, e.g. actions, reducers, constants...

scripts.gitCommit: git add . && git commit -m'auto commit npm publish/version update script' --allow-empty
scripts.build: npm run gitCommit &&  npm run minorVersion

author: Julius Koronci <jk@web-solutions.sk>
